name: Tetris by K&L
description:
We've come up with an idea to make small projects for fun and for developing our professional skills, so we've decided to start with an old one – Tetris. Funky music, colourful blocks, 2 weeks to make and voila! We hope you'll enjoy the game :)

Controls:

  • Left/Right arrow keys – to move figure
  • Up arrow key – to change figure's position 

Art: satacat

Coding: kndratova

Music and sound credits:  Komiku (music) & Leszek_Szary (sounds)

PS: there'll be some updates for the game, bur for now it's all we've got
